source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [IdLogDetail]
      ,[IdLogSource]
      ,[LogSource]
      ,[LogStepName]
      ,[LogQuery]
      ,[LogType]
      ,[LogMessage]
      ,[LogExtractionTimestamp]
      ,[LogEventDateFrom]
      ,[LogEventDateTo]
      ,[LogStatus]
      ,[LogRecordCount]
      ,[LogStartDt]
      ,[LogEndDt]
      ,[AdfPipelineRunId]
FROM [EnergyDashboard].[MdDataMartLogDetail]
WHERE 1=1
	AND LogStatus = 'Initialised'
ORDER BY [IdLogDetail]

SELECT [IdLogDetail]
      ,[IdLogSource]
      ,[LogSource]
      ,[LogStepName]
      ,[LogTargetTableName]
      ,[LogQuery]
      ,[LogType]
      ,[LogMessage]
      ,[LogExtractionTimestamp]
      ,[LogEventDateFrom]
      ,[LogEventDateTo]
      ,[LogStatus]
      ,[LogRecordCount]
      ,[LogStartDt]
      ,[LogEndDt]
      ,[AdfPipelineRunId]
  FROM [EnergyDashboard].[MdSourceLogDetail]
WHERE 1=1
	AND LogStatus = 'Initialised'
ORDER BY [IdLogDetail]

preCopyScript.value:
delete from [STG].[ALL]
WHERE ID_Key = '@{item().ID_Key}' 
AND Sensor_Type = '@{item().Sensor_Type}'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT distinct SourceTableName,  min(NR_MINUTES) as NR_MINUTES  FROM STG.MdSource as md
left join [IOT].[DIM_SENSOR_TYPE] as s
on md.SourceTableName = s.CD_SENSOR_TYPE
left join [IOT].[DIM_SENSOR_TYPE_AGGREGATION] sta
on s.ID_SENSOR_TYPE = sta.ID_SENSOR_TYPE
WHERE md.CompanyId = '@{pipeline().parameters.CompanyId}'
GROUP BY SourceTableName
